name: Shyamchi Aai
title: Shyamchi Aai is an autobiography of social activist Pandurang Sadashiv Sane (known as Sane Guruji).

name: Pride and Prejudice
title: Pride and Prejudice is the second novel by English author Jane Austen, published in 1813.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
title: To Kill a Mockingbird is a novel by the Harper Lee, a great book that should read.

name: Chhawa by Shivaji
title: Classic marathi novel based on Sambhaji's life. Shriman Yogi (श्रीमान योगी) , must read this book

name: Good Omens

name: Catch 22
title: Catch-22 is a satirical war novel by American author Joseph Heller.

name: Cold Comfort Farm
title: Cold Comfort Farm is a comic novel by English author Stella Gibbons, published in 1932.

name: Dracula
title: Dracula is a novel by Bram Stoker, published in 1897. An epistolary novel.

name: Frankenstein
title: Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus is an 1818 novel.

name: Bayou Boneyard
title: Murder in the Bayou Boneyard: A Cajun Country Mystery .
